message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this unique product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a competitive offer. I'm offering the product to you for $15000.

I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to stay within my budget. Can you meet me halfway and consider my offer?

I understand that you're on a budget, Bob, but I have to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more than that. I'm counteroffering $13500. This is the lowest I can go, and I think it's a fair price considering the product's value to you.

I understand that you're looking to make a profit, Alice, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I can only go up to $11500. Can you consider my offer?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm starting to think that you're not taking my minimum price seriously. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum. I'm counteroffering $14000. This is as low as I can go, and I'm starting to consider other options if you're not willing to meet me here.

I understand that you're trying to get closer to your minimum price, Alice, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I can only go up to $12000. Can you consider my offer?
